text.login.username.title: Sign in to continue
text.login.password.title: Continue Sign-In
text.login.verify.title: Protect your account
text.login.verify.reason: Looks like you've logged in from a new device/address {device}, we've sent a 6-digit code to your email
text.login.verify.ignore: Do not require verification on this device
text.login.notice: By continuing, you agree to AmMall's
text.login.code.desc: We've sent you a 6-digit verification code to your email

http.3XX: You have communication problem with server, should contact the IT department.
http.401: Please login again to access system.
http.403: You are not allowed to access this.
http.4XX: You encounter issues, mostly because your action is not matching the server's requirement.
http.5XX: Server has problems, should contact the IT department.
http.XXX: Other problem, should contact the IT department.
